meanings.definition: A person who devises or plans something.
meanings.sent1: The devisers of the project worked hard to come up with a plan.
meanings.sent2: The devisers of the event organized everything meticulously.
meanings.sent3: The devisers of the surprise party kept it a secret from everyone.
meanings.sent4: The devisers of the escape route were like master puzzle solvers.
meanings.sent5: The devisers of the strategy were praised for their creativity.

meanings.definition: Those who create or invent something.
meanings.sent1: The devisers of the new technology revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent2: The devisers of the innovative product received awards for their work.
meanings.sent3: The devisers of the recipe added a unique twist to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The devisers of the game designed challenging levels for players.
meanings.sent5: The devisers of the solution were hailed as visionaries.

meanings.definition: The act of devising or planning something.
meanings.sent1: The devisers of the heist carefully mapped out their plan.
meanings.sent2: The devisers of the marketing campaign brainstormed ideas together.
meanings.sent3: The devisers of the prank had everyone fooled with their scheme.
meanings.sent4: The devisers of the plot crafted a suspenseful storyline.
meanings.sent5: The devisers of the project collaborated to bring their vision to life.
